Title: Japan’s JBIC agrees to 80 billion yen loan to Chugoku Electric for LNG imports, energy security
Description: The Japan Bank for International Cooperation has agreed to loan 80 billion Japanese yen ($604 million) to Japanese utility Chugoku Electric Power to support its imports of LNG and contribute to stable power supply and energy security for the country.
Author: CK

Title: PTT tender award reflects weak prompt LNG demand; low prompt price may create buying interest
Description: Thailand’s state-owned PTT may have netted the year’s lowest price for a spot LNG cargo this week, with this possibly creating some buying interest among other Asian LNG buyers.
Author: CK
